item.name: Healing water
item.description: If used, it distributes up to 2000 health among the owner and nearby allies

item.name: Bag of healing water
item.description: If used, it distributes up to 4000 health among the owner and nearby allies

item.name: Rye spikes
item.description: If used, they distribute up to 1000 food among the owner and nearby allies

item.name: Healing herbs
item.description: If used, they completely restore health and stamina of the owner

item.name: Poison mushrooms
item.description: If used, they permanently add 1 level to the owner.\nTo use them, the owner must have at least 90% health

item.name: Ash of druid heart
item.description: If used, it completely restores the health of the owner and 8 nearby allies

item.name: Battle drums of rage
item.description: If used, they add 30 damage to the owner and nearby allies for 5 seconds

item.name: Horn of victory
item.description: If used, it deals 75 damage to 15 nearby enemies

item.name: Finger of death
item.description: If used, it kills 4 nearby enemies (it does not affect heroes)

item.name: Skull of pain
item.description: Adds 250 health.\nIf used, it takes up to 10% from the owner's max health to deal half of that amount as damage to 6 nearby enemies (it does not affect heroes)

item.name: Fur gloves of health
item.description: They add 1200 health.\nIf used, they restore the health of a nearby ally by taking it from the owner

item.name: Concentration stone
item.description: Adds 60 damage.\nIf used, it restores the health of the owner by taking it from an ally of choice

item.name: Blood stone
item.description: Adds 50 experience.\nIf used, it restores the health of the owner by taking it from an enemy of choice (with a cooldown of 20 seconds)

item.name: Snake skin
item.description: Adds 10 damage.\nIt is possible to combine 3 to create a Belt of snakes

item.name: Belt of snakes
item.description: Adds 30 damage

item.name: Eagle feather
item.description: Adds 200 health.\nIt is possible to combine 3 to create a Feather amulet

item.name: Feather amulet
item.description: Adds 600 health

item.name: Boar tooth
item.description: Adds 2 levels.\nIt is possible to combine 3 to create a Boar teeth amulet

item.name: Boar teeth amulet
item.description: Adds 6 levels

item.name: King's belt
item.description: Adds 600 health and 10 armor

item.name: Elephant tusk
item.description: Restores the health of the owner by 25 every second

item.name: Amulet of triumph
item.description: Restores the health of the owner by 100 upon every kill, with a 50% chance to restore 50 more health

item.name: Ring of power
item.description: Adds 20 damage.\nIt stores up to 600 charges to restore the health of the owner by 20 every second

item.name: Golden ankh
item.description: Adds 500 health and 8 armor.\nIt restores the health of the owner by 10 every second as long as it remains below 25%

item.name: Silver ankh
item.description: Adds 4 armor to the owner's attached units

item.name: Amulet of courage
item.description: Adds 4 damage to the owner's attached units

item.name: Stamina diamond
item.description: Restores the stamina of the owner's attached units more quickly

item.name: Invigorating dark harp
item.description: Adds 300 health and 6 armor.\nIt restores the stamina of the owner and 8 nearby allies by 4 every 10 seconds

item.name: Travel boots
item.description: Add 300 health and 2 levels.\nThey restore the health of the owner and all attached units by 1 every 0.5 seconds

item.name: Gem of wisdom
item.description: Gives a 33% chance to gain 2 experience every time that an attached unit dies

item.name: Scroll of death
item.description: Restores the health of the owner by 5 every time that an attached unit dies.\nIt gives to every attached unit a 10% chance to spawn a ghoul upon death

item.name: Scroll of life
item.description: Restores the health of the owner by 5 every time that an attached unit kills an enemy.\nIt gives to every attached unit a 10% chance to spawn a ghoul upon every kill

item.name: Bear teeth amulet
item.description: Adds 4 damage

item.name: Belt of might
item.description: Adds 4 armor

item.name: Herb amulet of luck
item.description: Adds 30 health

item.name: God's gift
item.description: Increases the owner's movement and attack speed by 10%.\nIt completely restores the health of the owner at the first kill, then it disappears

item.name: Spoils of war
item.description: Add 100 gold to the settlement the owner enters, then they disappear

item.name: Gold
item.description: Adds gold to the settlement the owner enters

item.name: Gold bag
item.description: Adds gold to the settlement the owner enters, then it disappears

item.name: Veteran ring
item.description: Becomes Veteran medal at the first kill

item.name: Veteran medal
item.description: Adds 6 and 10% damage

item.name: Veteran offence
item.description: Adds 25% damage

item.name: Veteran defence
item.description: Adds 25% armor

item.name: Veteran health
item.description: Adds 25% health

item.name: Noble offence
item.description: Adds 8 damage

item.name: Noble defence
item.description: Adds 8 armor

item.name: Damage charm
item.description: Adds 4 damage.\nIt disappears at the first kill

item.name: Armor charm
item.description: Adds 4 armor.\nIt disappears at the first kill

item.name: Health charm
item.description: Adds 40 health.\nIt disappears at the first kill

item.name: Knowledge charm
item.description: Adds 4 levels.\nIt disappears at the first kill

item.name: Emblem of Democracy
item.description: Adds 80 health

item.name: Emblem of Oligarchy
item.description: Adds 6 damage and 2 armor

item.name: Charm of Athena
item.description: Increases the owner's movement and attack speed by 40%

item.name: Charm of Aegle
item.description: Adds 10% health.\nIt restores the health of the owner by 2 every second

item.name: Faded gem
item.description: The gem is too weak to channel the power of the Goddess Kathobodua

item.name: Glowing gem
item.description: If used, the gem can channel the power of the Goddess Kathobodua

item.name: Gem of power
item.description: The gem makes the power of the Goddess Kathobodua flow through the owner's veins

item.name: Chosen one's gem
item.description: Adds 80 damage.\nThe gem makes the power of the Goddess Kathobodua flow through the Chosen one's veins: "Gems hold their edge"
